item.title: UGC Creators! Create faceless videos for us! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello everyone,

I hope this post finds you well! I'm excited to share a new venture I'm launching—a subscription service specifically designed to assist marketers with faceless marketing. The goal is to help them grow their accounts without the need for personal appearances in their content.

One of the most exciting aspects of this project is the opportunity to collaborate with talented video creators. I have always admired the creativity and aesthetic appeal of your videos, and I am eager to explore the possibility of working together on this initiative.

## What We're Looking For

We are on the lookout for a set of aesthetically pleasing videos that we can resell as part of our subscription service. Specifically, we are interested in creating a set of 10 themed videos, each 10-15 seconds long. These videos will not feature your face but will instead focus on beautiful and engaging backgrounds.

### Example Themes

Here are some examples of the types of videos we're interested in:

- [Example 1](https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8ctKMwA9I0/?igsh=cTZubmM4NndzZW0w)
- [Example 2](https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8cyBdVgKSP/?igsh=MW0xNWlreWU2ajNsMw==)
- [Example 3](https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8WQ-BBS0zg/?igsh=NG9qMGoyaXN6cXll)
- [Example 4](https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8LG1piP5bO/?igsh=MXA1djB4b3BwZGU3aA==)
- [Example 5](https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8VCAI2ydGu/?igsh=OXFlN3JkNzB5Ynl0)
- [Example 6](https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8St1qvA9y5/?igsh=c2E1bjZvN3cyYmx1)
- [Example 7](https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8eeRJWAZ6Z/?igsh=OGRkd3NrYmJ4NWRo)

These examples showcase the kind of aesthetic and quality we're aiming for. You can get as creative as you like, capturing scenes in a variety of settings such as a beach, coffee shop, bedroom, or while holding food. The goal is to have a diverse range of backgrounds in each pack.

### How You Can Get Involved

If this sounds like something you'd be interested in, we'd love to discuss it further with you. We believe this could be a fantastic opportunity to leverage your creative talents while contributing to a unique and innovative marketing service.

Please let us know if you're interested in creating a set of 10 themed videos.

Thank you, and I look forward to the possibility of collaborating!

Best,
Hali

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 07:04 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, Screencasting Video, Education, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, Screencasting Video, Education, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Team to Create 40-60 Videos to Boost Our Software Startup's Social Media Presence - Upwork
item.description:
We are a startup software company looking for a talented team to create 40-60 high-quality videos to help us grow our social media following. The videos will be used for promotional purposes on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube. The team will be responsible for brainstorming creative ideas, developing engaging scripts, filming, and editing the videos. We are seeking a team with experience in video production, storytelling, and social media marketing. The ideal candidates should have a keen eye for detail, strong communication skills, and the ability to deliver high-quality work on time. If you are passionate about creating compelling video content and have a proven track record of successful social media campaigns, we would love to hear from you!
We will also give you script too! Most of the video will be like AI editing kind of videos.

Demo:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8UgwuTK8oF/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8MyjKDAp0w/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8brrpXKjaI/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8drf8dOKVs/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7T62g1tDPJ/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8WyKcEtzTl/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C66Os9iIE2V/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C5BgiSPpGO3/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C5GnagaJB-a/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C5gHMPFpJvQ
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8WFBPaOleq
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C70QB0RxVd5/




Submit with:
Your previous work demo (Must include other ways don't waist connect)
Portfolio Link (If your agency have a portfolio)
Also include link these clients instagram , tiktok or facebook video urls that you or your team created!


See you soon!

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 22, 2024 06:52 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram
Country: Bangladesh
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for TikTok, Reels, and YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a creative storyteller with a knack for video editing and a passion for sports? We're looking for a talented Video Editor to join our team and bring our sports content to life across TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube. If you have experience crafting engaging, informative sports videos and thrive in a collaborative environment, we want to hear from you!

Position: Video Editor for TikTok, Reels, and YouTube  
Location: Remote  
Type: Freelance/Contract

Responsibilities:
- Edit raw sports footage into polished, high-quality videos tailored for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube.
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and deliver compelling, informative sports content.
- Incorporate graphics, special effects, music, and sound effects to enhance the final product.
- Optimize video content to suit each platform’s unique style and audience.
- Stay updated with industry trends, social media algorithms, and techniques to keep our content fresh and innovative.
- Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery of all video assets.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Video Editor with a strong portfolio showcasing your work, especially in sports and informative content on TikTok, Reels, and YouTube.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
- Excellent understanding of color correction, sound editing, and visual effects.
- Strong attention to detail and ability to work under tight deadlines.
- Good communication skills and the ability to take feedback constructively.
- A passion for sports storytelling and a keen eye for aesthetics.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume, cover letter, and a link to your portfolio. We look forward to seeing your creative work!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 06:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Concept Video, Gaming Video, Instagram Reels, Footage-Based Video, Social Media Video, YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography
Skills: Concept Video, Gaming Video, Instagram Reels, Footage-Based Video, Social Media Video, YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Need short music track for product video for google ads - Upwork
item.description:
We need music for short clip (clip length approx 30 sec. music should be approx 1 minute to have some space) which we use for google marketing.

The clip is about printed zebra blinds. The video editor and me have some ideas about it, when you contant us i can show the ideas more exactly.

But short explanation: The beat from the song "blue monday", which is also popular in social media reels, is someone which would fit. the kind of beat.
At the beginning different kind of images will be shown, always after a new beat. i tried to show it in a video to understand (attach).

I know that i dont need to mention, that we need not a copy of "blue monday" and get license trouble.  But to be sure i mention it :)



Budget: $150
Posted On: June 22, 2024 06:51 UTC
Category: Music Production
Skills:Audio Editing
Skills: Audio Editing
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.description:

item.title: Creative Video Ad Creator for King Palm Smoking Wraps - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a creative and talented video ad creator? Do you have a knack for making engaging and fun short-form videos? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you!

**About Us:**
King Palm is the leading natural alternative brand to tobacco products in the smoking wraps industry, known for our premium, natural leaf wraps found in smoke shops across the world. Our products are celebrated for their high quality, unique features, and the exceptional smoking experience they provide. We are looking for a passionate video ad creator to join our team and help us showcase the best of King Palm through captivating video content. See our Amazon products and reviews here from thousands of fans:

https://www.amazon.com/s?k=king+palm&crid=1O6FF5H5M4WK1&sprefix=king+pal%2Caps%2C202&ref=nb_sb_noss_2

**Responsibilities:**
- Create engaging short-form video ads (15 seconds to 1 minute) highlighting the features and benefits of King Palm smoking wraps.
- Receive product samples and use them in the videos to demonstrate their quality and uniqueness.
- Develop creative concepts and storylines that resonate with our target audience.
- Edit and finalize videos ensuring they are polished and professional.
- Collaborate with our marketing team to align with our brand's vision and goals.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience in creating short-form video content (portfolio or examples required).
- Proficiency in video editing software and tools.
- Strong creative and storytelling skills.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Excellent communication skills.
- Passion for the smoking accessories industry is a plus.

**Benefits:**
- Competitive compensation.
- Flexible working hours.
- Opportunity to work with a leading brand in the industry.
- Potential for ongoing projects and long-term collaboration.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 06:44 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Text to Video - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a creative individual to join our team and help bring our scripts to life through captivating video content. While experience with Canva and Pictory is beneficial, it is not required; we provide comprehensive training from scratch. Our company specializes in creating engaging educational content and we are committed to fostering talent and creativity.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with the team to transform text scripts into visually appealing video content.
Utilize Canva and Pictory tools to enhance the visual storytelling process.
Meet project deadlines and communicate effectively with the team.

Requirements:

Strong passion for visual storytelling and creativity.
Willingness to learn and develop skills in video creation using Canva and Pictory.
Ability to effectively communicate ideas and collaborate with team members.
Previous experience in graphic design or video editing is a plus but not required.

Conditions:

Flexible work schedule to accommodate learning and skill development.
Remote work opportunity with the possibility of occasional team meetings.
Comprehensive training provided to learn Canva and Pictory tools from scratch.

If you're eager to embark on a journey of creativity and learning, we invite you to join our team! Submit your portfolio and a brief resume to apply.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 22, 2024 06:31 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
I am providing an After Effects project file and the associated source files of an After Effects project.

I'd like a Youtube tutorial to be written, and a screen recording made showing this project being remade from scratch.

Notes:
There is s portion where I use https://magichour.ai/ to add a "superman overlay" over one of the players. I use the prompt "A Superman With A Superhero Suit And Cape."

item.title: Video Editor for Movie critics youtube video - Upwork
item.description:
I have a Youtube channel in the filmmaking analysis niche

Your job will be finding clips and pictures from the movies, and edit them in the video.
each segment should be relevant to what the voiceover is saying in that moment, to keep everything engaging.

I don't need motion graphics or complicated things, I basically only need someone to trim sections from the movies (1080p, 60fps) and put them in the video as B roll, while maintaing somewhat the pacing of the voiceover.

Some parts of the video like the intro will already be edited by me, since I still want to be the one in charge of the more articulate things.

Some example of the editing I need.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JR3hzUtJKYA&t=1s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LJqB_MIBkT8&t=20s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oQzBHIhsszE&t=69s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aiJyq6H24Vc&t=23s

Please show some previous work relevant to this movie analysis type of videos

Price can be discussed, so feel free to dm.


Budget: $35
Posted On: June 22, 2024 06:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Film, Movie, Narrative Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Skills: Film, Movie, Narrative Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Country: Italy
click to apply
